description: Try our easy to follow Pork Kebabs with Sweet & Sour Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Zucchini,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Pork,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Pork Kebabs with Sweet & Sour Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup sweet and sour stirfry sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium heat and pre-soak the bamboo skewers.

Add onion and capsicum and cook for 8 minutes or until soft. Add pineapple and rice and stir until combined. Stir in stock and sauce. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 10 minutes. Cover pan, reduce heat to low and cook for 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Stir through spring onions.
Cut zucchini into thick rounds. Thread pork, alternating with zucchini rounds on presoaked bamboo skewers.

Preheat a chargrill over medium heat until hot. Spray skewers with oil. Add to chargrill. Cook for 3 minutes each side or until cooked through. Divide rice among plates. Top with skewers and spring onion. Serve.
